Clipboard ++

Aug 2015

Overview

Development Java, JavaFX
Team size Solo
Category Personal Project
Available links GitHub Repository

Project description

When designing Clipboard ++, my goal was to create a tool that I would be able to use to boost my efficiency. The application allows storage and editing of multiple clipboard items. The data flavours that it supports are strings, images, hyperlinks, and filelist items.

Responsibilities

  • Designed layouts in Java FX
  • Implemented clipboard listener
  • Applied concurrency concepts to multithreaded app
  • Designed logo in Photoshop
